<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task_sla</collection><condition>current.stage.changesTo('breached') || current.stage.changesTo('in_progress')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLA Timeout Handle</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	// 拿到被监控任务记录
	gs.info('aaaaaa Business Rule Test:');
	var gr = new GlideRecord(current.task.getRefRecord().getTableName());
	if (gr.get(current.task.sys_id)) {
		// 如果SLA变为breached
		if (current.stage.changesTo('breached')) {
			// priority降级
			if (gr.priority < 4) { // 1高，4低
				gr.priority = gr.priority + 1;
			}
			gr.update();
		}
		// 如果SLA还未超时（变为in_progress），则state=4，不过只对第一次进入有效，避免反复改状态
		else if (current.stage.changesTo('in_progress')) {
			gr.state = 4;
			gr.update();
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-18 07:54:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>df72957b83536690d29556d6feaad3d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLA Timeout Handle</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NTTWorkflowDemo" source="x_1799060_nttworkf">778a826b83cfae10d29556d6feaad303</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NTTWorkflowDemo">778a826b83cfae10d29556d6feaad303</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_df72957b83536690d29556d6feaad3d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-18 08:09:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=df72957b83536690d29556d6feaad3d9"/></record_update>
